translation.en: [narrator] A long, long time ago, a kingdom lived in peace…
translation.es: Hace mucho tiempo, había un reino que vivía en paz.

translation.en: believing they had nothing to fear.
translation.es: Creían que no tenían nada que temer.

translation.en: But lurking in the shadows
was a great and terrible evil.
translation.es: había un gran y terrible mal.

translation.en: The monster attacked without warning,
laying waste to everything and everyone in its path.
translation.es: y arrasó con todo a su paso, vivo o inanimado.

translation.en: But in that darkest hour, a hero rose up.
translation.es: Pero, cuando todo parecía perdido, apareció una heroína.

translation.en: Her name was Gloreth.
[Gloreth] Go back to the shadows from whence you came!
translation.es: ¡Regresa a las sombras de donde surgiste!

translation.en: [narrator] Gloreth vowed that her people would never be vulnerable again.
translation.es: Gloriana juró que su gente jamás volvería a estar vulnerable,

translation.en: So she trained an elite force of knights and decreed that their descendants
translation.es: así que entrenó a una fuerza de caballeros de élite y decretó que sus descendientes protegerían el reino por generaciones.

translation.en: would protect the kingdom for generations to come.
translation.es: y decretó que sus descendientes protegerían el reino por generaciones.

translation.en: But if you want a happily ever after,
translation.es: Pero, si quieren vivir felices para siempre,

translation.en: you can never let your guard down
because the monsters are always out there.
translation.es: porque los monstruos están siempre al acecho.

translation.en: [Nate Knight] Good evening, folks. We are coming to you live from the Glorodome.
translation.es: Buenas noches, amigos. Transmitimos en vivo desde el Gloródromo.

translation.en: -I'm Nate Knight. -I'm Alamzapam Davis.
translation.es: - Somos Nate Caballero… - Y Alamzapam Davis.

But this is also the most controversial knighting ceremony in a thousand years.
translation.es: Y además es la ceremonia de investidura más controvertida en 1000 años.

translation.en: You can feel the excitement and the tension.
translation.es: Se percibe la emoción y la tensión.

translation.en: -[child] Come on! It's starting! -Tonight, tradition will be cast aside,
translation.es: - ¡Vamos! ¡Ya empieza! - Hoy se dejará de lado la tradición.

translation.en: and the kingdom will change forever because of one man.
translation.es: El reino cambiará para siempre a causa de un solo hombre.

translation.en: Ballister. The street kid with the impossible dream of being a knight.
translation.es: Ballister, el niño sin hogar que soñaba con ser caballero, aunque fuera imposible.

translation.en: I'm here to slay monsters and protect our kingdom!
translation.es: ¡Vine a matar monstruos y a proteger nuestro reino!

translation.en: Impossible, that is, until the queen herself made a shocking decision.
translation.es: Imposible hasta que la mismísima reina tomó una decisión impactante.

translation.en: No, he doesn't come from a noble bloodline…
translation.es: No, no proviene de un linaje noble,

translation.en: …but he might just have the heart of a hero.
translation.es: pero podría tener el corazón de un héroe.

Direct descendant of Gloreth herself,

This video could damage people's faith in the Institute.
translation.es: La gente dejaría de confiar en el Instituto.

translation.en: No duh!
Look, I don't know why she framed me, but the Institute's not the problem.
translation.es: No sé por qué me tendió la trampa, pero el problema es la directora, no el Instituto.

translation.en: The Director is.
translation.es: pero el problema es la directora, no el Instituto.

translation.en: That's why I'm taking this to Ambrosius.
translation.es: Le llevaré el video a Ambrosio.

translation.en: -Who cares? -Ambro--
This is the man who cut off your arm. Arm-chopping is not a love language!
translation.es: Ese tipo te cortó el brazo. ¡Cortar brazos no es una muestra de amor!

translation.en: He didn't cut off my arm. He disarmed a weapon.
translation.es: No me cortó el brazo. Me desarmó.

translation.en: It's how we were trained.
They brainwashed you good.
translation.es: Sí que te lavaron el cerebro.

translation.en: You think this stops with the Director?
translation.es: ¿Crees que la directora es el único problema?

translation.en: You should be questioning everything right now.
The will of Gloreth, the Institute, the wall.
translation.es: la voluntad de Gloriana, el Instituto, el muro.

translation.en: What's it all really for? For protecting the realm.
translation.es: - ¿Para qué existen? - Para proteger el reino.

translation.en: You mean from villains like you?
Or monsters
like me?
Look, if we get this to Ambrosius, everything is gonna be okay.
translation.es: Oye, si le damos esto a Ambrosio, todo se resolverá.

translation.en: For both of us.
Okay, fine. But when things go south, I'm breaking stuff.
translation.es: Bueno, está bien. Pero, cuando todo salga mal, empezaré con los destrozos.

translation.en: -That won't be necessary. -[vocalizing]
Is something on your mind, Ambrosius?
You can talk to me.
My mind?
[exhales] I've lost my mind.
I've lost everything.
The man I love, my best friend.
translation.es: Perdí al hombre que amo, mi mejor amigo.

translation.en: Although now he's got a new best friend. What's that about?
translation.es: Aunque ahora cambió de mejor amigo. ¿Cuándo pasó? ¿Qué más me oculta?

translation.en: What else is he hiding? Who is the real him?
translation.es: Aunque ahora cambió de mejor amigo. ¿Cuándo pasó? ¿Qué más me oculta? ¿Quién es en realidad? ¿Quién soy yo? ¿Un descendiente de Gloriana?

translation.en: Who am I?
translation.es: ¿Quién es en realidad? ¿Quién soy yo? ¿Un descendiente de Gloriana?

translation.en: A direct descendant of Gloreth? I never asked for that.
translation.es: ¿Quién es en realidad? ¿Quién soy yo? ¿Un descendiente de Gloriana? Yo no pedí serlo.

translation.en: Now everyone expects me to arrest Ballister.
If I don't, I'm a traitor to you. If I do, I'm a traitor to him.
translation.es: y debo elegir entre traicionarla a usted o traicionarlo a él.

translation.en: Oh, and on top of that, I chopped off his arm!
translation.es: Y, por si no fuera suficiente, ¡le rebané el brazo!

translation.en: His arm! Who chops off an arm?
Because I was trained to? Arm chopping is not a love langua--
translation.es: Así me entrenaron, pero cortar brazos no es una muestra de am…

translation.en: I'm fine, Director.
-Ma'am. -Stay strong, Ambrosius.
The blood of Gloreth runs through your veins.
translation.es: La sangre de Gloriana te corre por las venas.

translation.en: -Ambrosius. -Knights!
They were like this when I got here.
You.
Me.
Ambrosius, the Director killed the queen.
translation.es: Ambrosio, la directora mató a la reina.

translation.en: -What? -Another desperate lie.
He's not a liar.
[laughing] Says the miscreant, whispering in his ear.
translation.es: Palabras de la bribona que le susurra al oído.

translation.en: Aw, thank you.
I'm innocent, and I have proof.
-He's got a weapon. -No!
Not anymore! Todd rules!
It doesn't matter. You shouldn't need proof. You know I'm not a murderer.
translation.es: No importa. No deberías necesitar pruebas. Sabes que no soy un asesino.

translation.en: What are you waiting for, Captain?
[Todd] Hurry before the whale gets here.
translation.es: Rápido, antes de que llegue la ballena.

translation.en: Come on, man.
Do the right thing.
Who is she, Bal?
What is she?
Ambrosius, I am begging you to trust me.
translation.es: Ambrosio, te ruego que confíes en mí.

translation.en: Arrest them.
You wanna know who the kid is?
Oh, I like where this is going.
translation.es: Me gusta lo que se avecina.

translation.en: You wanna show 'em? I'd love to.
Let's break stuff. Metal.
Is that a gorilla?
-Give me a sword. -We need to get you to safety.
translation.es: - Deme una espada. - Debemos ponerla a salvo.

translation.en: -Aah! -Get this thing in the air now!
-Oh! -Sorry, not sorry!
-You see a way out of here? -Of horse I do.
Okay, that was terrible.
Stop that… horse?
-We're going over, aren't we? -Yep! The only way out is down.
translation.es: - ¿Piensas saltar? - ¡Sí! Bajar es la única salida.

translation.en: -Horse! -Why are we always falling?!
Ha ha! Told you you'd want the wings. Whoo-hoo!
translation.es: Te dije que me pedirías las alas.

translation.en: -Okay, that was super gross. -Ha ha, I know!
translation.es: - Eso sí que fue un asco. - ¡Lo sé!

translation.en: Well, if it isn't the golden boy.
translation.es: Vaya, es el chico del momento.

translation.en: -That's the otter that bit me! -I can see your confusion.
translation.es: ¡La nutria que me mordió! Entiendo tu confusión. Tiene cola de nutria de río, pero patas…

translation.en: It has the tail of a river otter, but the webbed back feet--
translation.es: Entiendo tu confusión. Tiene cola de nutria de río, pero patas…

translation.en: Did I ever mean anything to you? Or was it all just a lie?
translation.es: ¿Alguna vez signifiqué algo para ti o fue todo una mentira?

translation.en: A lie? Says the guy running around with a monster!
translation.es: ¿Una mentira? ¡Lo dice el tipo que va con un monstruo!

translation.en: Don't call her that! She's smart, kind, and quite sophisticated.
translation.es: ¡No la llames así! Es lista, amable y muy sofisticada.

translation.en: That guy just peed his armor! He peed his armor!
And she has my back, unlike you.
translation.es: Y me apoya, a diferencia de ti.

translation.en: You lied to me about everything!
Only one lying to you is the Director!
translation.es: ¡La única que te miente es la directora!

translation.en: What? You're gonna kill me now too?
You believe that?
Then you never knew me at all.
Yeah. Now I'm gonna punch you in the face.
translation.es: Sí. Te daré un puñetazo en la cara.

translation.en: Now, I'm no doctor, but this cast looks delicious.
translation.es: No practico la medicina, pero este yeso se ve exquisito.

translation.en: Boss?
You think this hurts?
Wait till you see what we do to your pet monster.
translation.es: Espera a ver lo que le haremos a tu monstruo.

translation.en: No! Leave her alone!
Kwispy! Wait, what?
Hope you brought milk. No!
Wait, wait! No, no!
What?
[automated voice] Monster attack. Monster attack.
Seek immediate shelter.
-Monster attack. Monster attack. -It's okay.
-Monster attack. Monster attack. -M-Monster.
Monster attack. Monster attack.
Seek immediate shelter.
-Monster attack. -[knight] Her! Come on!
-I've got you, kid! -No! Stop!
-Are you okay? -I don't wanna talk about it.
-I know something's wrong. -I said I don't wanna talk about it!
translation.es: - Sé que algo anda mal. - ¡No quiero hablar!

translation.en: Hey, I'm just trying to help. I don't need your help!
translation.es: - Solo quiero ayudarte. - ¡No necesito tu ayuda!

translation.en: Did you see the way that little girl looked at me?
Kids.
Little kids.
They grow up believing that they can be a hero
translation.es: Les enseñan que pueden convertirse en héroes

translation.en: if they drive a sword into the heart of anything different.
translation.es: si les apuñalan el corazón a aquellos que sean distintos.

translation.en: And I'm the monster?
I don't know what's scarier.
The fact that everyone in this kingdom wants to run a sword through my heart…
translation.es: ¿El hecho de que todo el reino quiera atravesarme el corazón con una espada…

translation.en: or that sometimes
I just wanna let 'em.
We have to get you out of here.
We'll go over the wall.
We won't stop until we find someplace safe.
translation.es: No nos detendremos hasta encontrar un lugar seguro.

translation.en: Okay, we'll go together.
Together?
Listen, you were right about everything. The Institute, the wall…
translation.es: Escucha, tenías razón en todo. El Instituto, el muro…

translation.en: Ambrosius.
No matter what we do, we can't change the way people see us.
translation.es: Hagamos lo que hagamos, la gente no nos verá con otros ojos.

translation.en: You changed the way you see me.
translation.es: Tú me ves con otros ojos.

translation.en: Didn't you?
We can't let the Director get away with this. We shouldn't have to run.
translation.es: La directora no puede salirse con la suya. No deberíamos huir.

translation.en: And you made a deal, right?
We clear your name, you make me your sidekick.
translation.es: Si limpiamos tu nombre, seré tu compinche.

translation.en: You can't back out on a deal because you believe in truth and honor
translation.es: Y debes cumplirlo porque crees en la verdad, el honor y esas estupideces.

translation.en: and blah, blah, blah. All that stupid stuff.
translation.es: porque crees en la verdad, el honor y esas estupideces.

translation.en: Truth and honor aren't stupid, but all right.
translation.es: No son estupideces, pero está bien.

translation.en: So, you got a plan?
'Course I got a plan.
Something, something, something…
We win.
[knight] Excuse me, but the Director isn't available right now.
We need to talk!
Alone.
Was Ballister telling the truth?
He could've said anybody killed the queen, but he said you. Why you?
translation.es: Podría haber acusado a cualquiera, pero la acusó a usted. ¿Por qué a usted?

translation.en: Sir Goldenloin, is your loyalty to this kingdom
translation.es: Sir Pieldorada, ¿su lealtad yace con el reino

translation.en: or to a knight who consorts with a monster?
translation.es: o con un hombre que confraterniza con un monstruo?

translation.en: Did you swap his sword?
Did you set him up?
Tell me the truth!
Ever since I was young, I've had the same nightmare.
translation.es: Desde pequeña, he tenido la misma pesadilla.

translation.en: I find a crack in the wall.
translation.es: Encuentro una grieta en el muro.

translation.en: I yell out,
but no one listens.
And the crack grows bigger and bigger
translation.es: Y la grieta se agranda cada vez más,

translation.en: until the wall crumbles
translation.es: hasta que el muro se desmorona

translation.en: and the monsters pour in.
I begged the queen not to question the word of Gloreth.
translation.es: Rogué a la reina que no cuestionara la palabra de Gloriana,

translation.en: Not to question what's kept us safe for a thousand years.
translation.es: que nos mantuvo a salvo mil años.

translation.en: But she wouldn't listen.
Allowing Ballister to hold the sword was the first crack in the wall.
translation.es: Permitir a Ballister blandir una espada fue la primera grieta en el muro.

translation.en: And now
we have a monster in our kingdom.
translation.es: hay un monstruo en nuestro reino.

translation.en: Is that…
I'm sorry, Ambrosius.
So, yes, I framed Ballister.
I killed the queen.
Gloreth did whatever it took to keep the monsters out.
translation.es: Gloriana mantuvo lejos a los monstruos a toda costa.

translation.en: And so will I.
May Gloreth forgive you.
[Director] So, yes, I framed Ballister.
I killed the queen.
I can't wait for the kingdom to see this.
translation.es: Ya quiero que todo el reino lo vea.

translation.en: You.
Well, and my sidekick. Round of applause, ladies and gents.
translation.es: - Tú. - Sí, y mi compinche. - Aplausos, por favor. - ¿Actué bien?

translation.en: Was my acting okay? I was a little worried my last "Ehh" was too over the top.
translation.es: - Aplausos, por favor. - ¿Actué bien? Me preocupaba que mi último… fuera muy exagerado.

translation.en: If you're looking for feedback, it was a little dramatic. You won't win any awards, but it was good.
translation.es: Si me preguntas, fue un poco dramático. No ganarás premios, pero estuvo bien.

translation.en: I've never taken a class. Really? That's a surprise.
Not a one. Oh, don't forget your sword, boss.
translation.es: Ni una clase. - No olvides tu espada. - Se la regalo.

translation.en: Eh, she can keep it.
translation.es: - No olvides tu espada. - Se la regalo.

translation.en: I don't fight for her anymore.
You called me your sidekick. I did, didn't I?
translation.es: - Dijiste que soy tu compinche. - Es cierto.

translation.en: [singsong] You called me your sidekick. And I regret it already.
translation.es: - Dijiste que soy tu compinche. - Y ya me arrepiento.

translation.en: [singsong] You called me your sidekick. You called me…
translation.es: Dijiste que soy tu compinche. Dijiste que soy…

translation.en: We need to talk.
Bad time?
Come on, come on!
Yes! Let's take that pooch for a walk.
Eight, nine, ten.
Ooh, landing you in the Enchanted Forest, which is my domain.
translation.es: Vaya. Caíste en el bosque encantado y me pertenece.

translation.en: Cha-ching. 600 gold, please.
My Scottie dog will not pay your tyrannical toll.
translation.es: Mi terrier escocés no le pagará a tu trol tirano.

translation.en: He rallies the oppressed woodland creatures and starts a rebellion.
translation.es: Inicia una rebelión con las criaturas oprimidas del bosque.

translation.en: [blows fanfare] Squirrels scale the castle walls!
Bears batter down the gates! Letting chaos ensue!
translation.es: ¡Los osos derriban las puertas! ¡Y se desata el caos!

translation.en: -I'm still taking the 600 gold. -What?
You didn't tell me you could breathe fire.
translation.es: No sabía que lanzabas fuego por la boca.

translation.en: [chuckles] Metal. Best two out of three?
What?
Nothing.
Hey, check it out.
Whoa! A hundred-- 500-- 30,000--
Seventy-five-- The whole kingdom is seeing this thing.
translation.es: Van 100… 500… 750 000… ¡Todo el reino lo está viendo!

translation.en: Well, I guess there's only one question left.
translation.es: Creo que solo queda una pregunta por responder.

translation.en: What's that?
Can a shark dance?
Can a shark dance?
Watch me. [snaps teeth]
Still reeling from the monster attack, the kingdom is rocked
translation.es: Otro escándalo sacude al reino tras el último ataque.

translation.en: by new footage of the Director making a truly shocking confession.
translation.es: Hay un video de la directora en el que hace una confesión impactante.

translation.en: I framed Ballister. I killed the queen.
translation.es: Incriminé a Ballister. Maté a la reina.

translation.en: I framed Ballister. I killed the queen.
translation.es: Incriminé a Ballister. Maté a la reina.

translation.en: ♪ Is it ever gonna be enough? ♪
I framed Ballister. I killed the queen.
translation.es: Incriminé a Ballister. Maté a la reina.

translation.en: I killed the queen.
One question remains. Who's the real villain?
translation.es: La única duda ahora es quién es el verdadero villano.

translation.en: ♪ More and more and more and more ♪
-♪ More and more, more and more ♪ -Give us the Director!
♪ Is it ever gonna be enough? ♪
♪ More and more, more and more ♪
-With me. -Yes, sir.
Director!
You're under arrest for the murder of the queen and for--
translation.es: Queda bajo arresto por el asesinato de la reina y por…

translation.en: Ambrosius. This explains everything.
[man on TV] Zombies are immortal, eternal beings. There's no way to kill them.
translation.es: Los zombis son inmortales. No podemos matarlos.

translation.en: [woman on TV] But what if they come for us?
I can't believe I'm about to say this, but I actually feel bad for the zombies.
translation.es: No puedo creer lo que voy a decir, pero realmente me siento mal por los zombis.

translation.en: -Stop. Don't. -Hey.
Hey. It's okay. You're safe.
translation.es: Oye, todo está bien. Estás a salvo.

translation.en: -We're home. -Home?
I like it here.
Let's live here forever.
-You have 30 seconds. -Thirty seconds?
-That's a lot more than you've given me. -I'm here to save you.
translation.es: - Tú me diste menos. - Vine a salvarte.

translation.en: -You are so full of-- -Hey! Can I get you guys something?
translation.es: - ¿Sabes qué? Eres un… - Hola. ¿Qué les traigo?

translation.en: -Nachos! -Nachos!
Please.
And hold the olives.
He's allergic.
Bal, I wouldn't be here if it wasn't important.
translation.es: No estaría aquí si no tuviera que decirte algo importante.

translation.en: And I wouldn't be here if you'd stood up for me. That is not fair.
-We're done. So is she. -We now go live to the Institute.
translation.es: - Lo nuestro terminó y ella está acabada. - Debo decirte algo.

translation.en: -There is something I need to tell you. -[man] Hey, turn that up.
translation.es: - Lo nuestro terminó y ella está acabada. - Debo decirte algo. Sube el volumen.

translation.en: Citizens of the realm, that is not me in the recording.
translation.es: Ciudadanos del reino, la mujer de la grabación no soy yo.

translation.en: I know it looks like me and sounds like me, but it is not me.
translation.es: Sé que se parece a mí y tiene mi voz, pero no soy yo.

translation.en: That was the monster working with the real queen killer, Ballister.
translation.es: Es el monstruo que ayuda al verdadero regicida, Ballister.

translation.en: They are trying to trick you.
That's a lie.
We are under attack by something that can take any form.
translation.es: Nos ataca algo que puede tomar cualquier forma.

translation.en: It could be anyone.
Your spouse, your child, your best friend,
translation.es: Su pareja, sus hijos, sus amistades,

translation.en: the person sitting next to you.
translation.es: la persona sentada a su lado.

translation.en: None of us are safe
so long as the villain and that monster are still out there.
translation.es: mientras el villano y ese monstruo sigan sueltos.

translation.en: She's twisting everything.
Ambrosius, I'm not the villain here.
translation.es: Ambrosio, yo no soy el villano.

translation.en: I know.
I know.
I believe you.
I…
I'm sorry
for everything.
For your arm.
She manipulated you.
She manipulated both of us,
but together, we'll take her down and prove it to the kingdom.
translation.es: Pero juntos la venceremos y se lo demostraremos al reino.

translation.en: You'll be a knight again.
Thank you. The Director can't get away--
translation.es: Gracias. - La directora no se saldrá… - ¿La directora?

translation.en: The Director?
translation.es: - La directora no se saldrá… - ¿La directora?

translation.en: Bal, I'm talking about your sidekick.
translation.es: Bal, estoy hablando de tu compinche.

translation.en: Your sidekick set you up.
translation.es: Tu compinche te tendió una trampa.

translation.en: What?
This was all her plan.
All of it.
She's evil, Bal.
E-Evil?
No, you're wrong. We've been wrong about everything.
translation.es: No, te equivocas. Nos hemos equivocado en todo.

translation.en: Wrong about everything? Then explain this.
This scroll has been in the Institute vaults for a thousand years.
translation.es: Este pergamino estuvo miles de años en el Instituto.

translation.en: Look at it.
It's her, Bal.
She's Gloreth's monster.
She's come back to finish what she started, and she's using you to do it.
translation.es: Regresó para terminar lo que empezó y te está usando para lograrlo.

translation.en: But she's my friend.
Aren't I more than that?
We can slay this monster. We can go back to the way things were.
translation.es: Matemos al monstruo y todo volverá a la normalidad.

translation.en: -This was a mistake. -Bal, please.
-No, I can't do this. I'm done! -Listen to me!
She's using you to destroy the kingdom!
-You know what she is. -Stop!
-Why won't you admit it? You're in danger! -Why can't you just leave me alone?
translation.es: - Admítelo. Estás en peligro. - ¿Por qué no me dejas en paz?

translation.en: Because I love you.
Ohh. I have not slept like that in forever.
translation.es: Hacía añares que no dormía así.

translation.en: Why do you have your cloak on?
Is this you?
Where did you get that? Who have you been talking--
Tell me this isn't you.
You think that I would do that? That that's who I am?
translation.es: ¿Crees que yo haría eso? ¿Piensas que yo soy eso?

translation.en: I don't know.
You're the one who told me not to trust anybody, question everything.
translation.es: Tú dijiste que no confiara en nadie y cuestionara todo.

translation.en: That's right! Even now, with this, think about everything we have been through together.
translation.es: ¡Así es! Como en este caso, piensa en todo lo que vivimos juntos.

translation.en: I'm thinking about everything we've done.
translation.es: Es justo en lo que estoy pensando.

translation.en: Broken out of jail, stolen cars, kidnapped people, manipulated people.
translation.es: Nos fugamos de la cárcel, robamos autos, secuestramos y manipulamos gente.

translation.en: I was helping you.
translation.es: - Te estaba ayudando. - Me estabas usando.

translation.en: You were using me! You wanted them to see a villain.
translation.es: - Te estaba ayudando. - Me estabas usando. Querías que también me odiaran para no estar sola.

translation.en: Someone else to hate so you wouldn't be alone.
translation.es: Querías que también me odiaran para no estar sola.

translation.en: Because you're not a sidekick. You're a m--
translation.es: Porque no eres mi compinche. Eres un m…

translation.en: What? I'm a what?
You know what you are.
No, I want to hear you say it.
Come on, say it.
Say it!
Say that I'm a mon--
-I… -[Todd] Surround the place.
You two with me.
translation.es: - Yo… - Rodeen el lugar. Acompáñenme. Sí, señor.

translation.en: Your door is broken.
-Stay back! -No! Stop! Stop! She's my friend!
She's a monster.
[man] Surround it!
No!
Gloreth.
[man] Gloreth! Come here!
Gloreth--
Go back to the shadows from whence you came.
translation.es: Regresa a las sombras de donde surgiste.

translation.en: -[Ballister] What are you -[girl] A monster.
[Ballister] Are you even human? Just be a girl.
translation.es: ¿Siquiera eres humana? Quédate en forma de niña.

translation.en: [woman] There is no place for you!
translation.es: - ¡Aquí no eres bienvenida! - No me mientas.

translation.en: -[Ballister] Don't lie to me! -[whisper] She's a monster.
translation.es: - ¡Aquí no eres bienvenida! - No me mientas. Monstruo.

translation.en: Don't you wish you were normal? [Gloreth] Go back to the shadows from whence you came.
translation.es: - ¿No deseas ser normal? - Regresa a las sombras de…

translation.en: [Ballister] There's something wrong with you. What are you?
-[woman] Monster! -[Ballister] You know what you are!
You brought a monster into our home.
translation.es: Trajiste un monstruo a nuestro hogar.

translation.en: You should've stayed in the gutter where you belong.
translation.es: Deberías haberte quedado en tu alcantarilla.

translation.en: Now where is it?
Do you feel that?
I feel like the whole place kind of went like "wubba, wubba, wubba, wubba, wubba."
It's headed straight for the city. Alert the Institute.
translation.es: Va directo a la ciudad. Avísenle al Instituto.

translation.en: And you.
translation.es: Y, con respecto a ti, si esa cosa destruye el reino,

translation.en: If that thing destroys the kingdom, it's on you, bro.
translation.es: Y, con respecto a ti, si esa cosa destruye el reino, será tu culpa, amigo.

translation.en: Let's go!
Ma'am, incoming report from Sir Thodeus. -And? What is it? -[knight] Whoa.
translation.es: - Recibimos un informe de sir Thodeus. - ¿Y? ¿Qué quiere?

translation.en: -What is that? -What's going on?
We need barricades on Avenue A through F.
And can we clear the streets? These people are in danger.
translation.es: Y despejen la calle. Esta gente está en peligro.

translation.en: It's happening.
Sound the alarm! Sound the alarm! Hit it with everything we've got.
translation.es: ¡Haz sonar la alarma! Ataquen con todo lo que tengamos.

translation.en: [automated voice] Monster attack. Monster attack.
This is not a test.
Monster attack. Monster attack.
This is not a test.
Monster attack. Monster attack.
It's the monster!
Everyone stay calm.
Drones engaged.
Look out!
You're okay.
[Todd] Hey, Goldie. Watch how a real knight gets it done.
translation.es: Oye, Pielecita, mira cómo lo hace un verdadero caballero.

translation.en: All right, monster slayers.
Let's shoot some darts and break some hearts.
I'm gonna be a freaking hero.
Out of my way!
We need more firepower! This thing is gonna kill us all!
translation.es: Necesitamos más potencia de fuego. ¡Nos matará a todos!

translation.en: [woman] Look out!
-High five! -Bro.
[man] Get out of here!
Get me to the wall.
[automated voice running down] Monster attack. Monster attack. Monster attack. Monster attack.
What have I done?
[announcer] The game that lets you be a hero.
translation.es: El juego en el que te conviertes en héroe.

translation.en: I killed a monster!
I killed two!
Come on. Let's go.
Help!
Keep them moving. Get everyone underground. Yes, sir.
translation.es: - Asegúrate de que se refugien. - Sí, señor.

translation.en: Bal?
-Bal! -[man] Forget the kid. Let's go.
-Let's go! -Come on!
You've gotta be kidding me.
Ma'am, someone is turning the cannon into the kingdom.
translation.es: Señora, alguien apunta el cañón hacia el reino.

translation.en: Yes, I know. I gave the order.
translation.es: Sí, lo sé. Yo di la orden.

translation.en: But firing them will take out half the city.
translation.es: Un disparo podría destruir media ciudad.

translation.en: Innocent people will die.
-And so will the monster. -But--
What are we doing?
You don't belong here!
[Nimona] I don't know what's scarier.
The fact that everyone in this kingdom wants to run a sword through my heart…
translation.es: ¿El hecho de que todo el reino quiera atravesarme el corazón con una espada…

translation.en: or that sometimes…
I just wanna let 'em.
I'm sorry.
I'm sorry.
I see you, Nimona.
And you're not alone.
Fire the cannons.
Kill it.
-I said fire the-- -No!
It's over.
It's fooling you. Fooling all of you!
translation.es: Te está engañando. ¡Los engaña a todos!

translation.en: Can't you see this is what it wants? For us to let our guard down!
translation.es: ¿No ven que esto es lo que quiere? ¡Que bajemos la guardia!

translation.en: I see what it really is, and so did Gloreth!
translation.es: Yo lo veo por lo que es, ¡al igual que Gloriana!

translation.en: That monster is a threat to our very way of life!
And what if we're wrong?
What if we've always been wrong?
No!
No!
Let's go!
That gun's gonna kill everyone.
Hey, boss.
Be right back. I'm gonna go break some stuff.
translation.es: Ya vuelvo. Empezaré con los destrozos.

translation.en: -Wait, Nimona. What are you-- -It's time to rewrite this story.
translation.es: - Espera. ¿Qué…? - Hora de reescribir la historia.

translation.en: Nimona! Nimona!
Go back to the shadows from whence you came!
translation.es: ¡Regresa a las sombras de donde surgiste!

translation.en: Nimona!
Come back.
Please come back.
[Ballister] Some of us don't get the happily ever after we were looking for.
translation.es: Algunos no vivimos felices para siempre, como esperábamos.

translation.en: Maybe it's not that kind of kingdom.
translation.es: Quizá no es esa clase de reino.

translation.en: Or maybe it's not the end of the story.
translation.es: O quizá no es el fin de la historia.

translation.en: [girl] Over here, I'm free.
Hey, boss.
Holy sh--
♪ Future on my mind ♪ ♪ I'm leavin' the past behind ♪
translation.es: BASADA EN LA NOVELA GRÁFICA DE N. D. STEVENSON

translation.en: ♪ You can't stop me ♪
